divs: Sighting DetailsAt approximately 7:58 Saturday night out walking dog. Observed sky northeast. Bright orange light, traveling horizontally crossed my street. Called to two neighbors in their garage to observe and all of us saw an object passing northwest at 7:58 Saturday, Oct. 13th, 2012, perfectly horizontally. About the slowest speed of a freqent A10 from our AFB up north (Grissom). We saw an orange (flaming) glow from the side of the vehicle. All 3 of us saw the event. Reports of a UFO were printed in the Greenwood newspaper two days later; emitting blue light. Our object flew straight and level out of sight to the NW. Trees to the NW eliminated further viewing.
Summary: Observed orange light traveling NW with a flaming orange light perfectly horizonatal above trees.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Pendleton
There were no other sightings in Pendleton on or around October 13th 2012
